sentences.en: a soft pulp of leaves and mud
sentences.cn: 树叶和泥巴混成的浆液

sentences.en: After the abstraction of the juice from the orange, only a tasteless pulp is left.
sentences.cn: 柳橙里的汁去掉後, 只剩下不可口的肉了.

sentences.en: Cook the fruit gently until it forms a pulp.
sentences.cn: 用文火把水果煮烂。

sentences.en: Halve the melon and scoop out the pulp.
sentences.cn: 把瓜切成两半，挖出瓜瓤。

sentences.en: I tried to talk myself out of a fight and got beaten to a pulp instead by three other boys.
sentences.cn: 我尽量克制住自己不要打架，却被另外3个男孩打成了重伤。

sentences.en: Make maximum use of the whole fruit, including the pulp which is high in fibre.
sentences.cn: 水果的各个部分都要最大限度地利用，包括富含纤维的果肉。

sentences.en: Mash the bananas to a pulp .
sentences.cn: 把香蕉捣成糊状。

sentences.en: pulped apples
sentences.cn: 苹果泥

sentences.en: Scoop out the pulp and serve it with sugar.
sentences.cn: 把果肉挖出来和糖一起食用.

sentences.en: Squash the grapes into a pulp.
sentences.cn: 把葡萄压榨成酱.

sentences.en: Stew the apple and blackberries to make a thick pulp.
sentences.cn: 将苹果和黑莓炖成稠浆。

sentences.en: The birds usually digest the pulp rather than the seeds.
sentences.cn: 鸟类通常消化其果肉而不是种子.

sentences.en: The brute guarding him beat him to a pulp.
sentences.cn: 那个看守他的凶汉把他打得一塌糊涂.

sentences.en: The company manufactures pulp and paper products.
sentences.cn: 这个公司制造纸浆和纸产品.

sentences.en: The meat was cooked to rags [ a pulp ] .
sentences.cn: 肉煮得 稀烂.

sentences.en: The olives are crushed to a pulp by stone rollers.
sentences.cn: 橄榄被石磙碾成了酱。

sentences.en: The pulp is full and flesh.
sentences.cn: 果肉肥厚.

sentences.en: The pulp of this watermelon is too spongy.
sentences.cn: 这西瓜瓤儿太肉了.

sentences.en: timber grown for wood pulp
sentences.cn: 种植以制造纸浆的树木

sentences.en: You've boiled these vegetables to a pulp.
sentences.cn: 你把这些蔬菜煮成菜泥了.

words.tran_cn: 果肉状的；泥状的；纸浆状的
纸浆；[食品]果肉；黏浆状物质

phrases.phrase: beat (或 smash) someone to a pulp

phrases.tran_cn: 低俗小说（电影名称）；黑色追缉令

trans.tran_cn: 纸浆，黏浆状物质，果肉，牙髓，[冶]矿浆
trans.tran_en: a very soft substance that is almost liquid, made by crushing plants, wood, vegetables etc

trans.tran_cn: 使…化成纸浆；除去…的果肉
trans.tran_en: to beat or crush something until it becomes very soft and almost liquid

trans.tran_cn: 使…化成纸浆，除去…的果肉，取出（咖啡豆的）果肉
trans.tran_en: to beat or crush something until it becomes very soft and almost liquid
